loans.name: Josefa Seneyda

texts.es: Josefa es una mujer casada, de profesión maestra de educación primaria, labora en un colegio de la zona donde vive, ella tiene una necesidad de mejorar su vivienda, por eso visito ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento y poder efectuar la obra deseada y de esa manera mejorar las condiciones  familiares, ya que el mismo lo utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción como ladrillo, cemento, clavos y zinc
texts.en: Josefa’s married and an elementary school teacher by profession.  She works in a local school in the zone where she lives.  She needs to do some home improvements and visited Ceprodel to request a loan to do said improvements to improve her family conditions.   She will use the loan to buy building supplies like bricks, cement, nails and metal sheeting.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Ismael Antonio

texts.es:
Condega un municipio conocido como tierra de alfareros por su artesanía y gente trabajadora, vive el señor Ismael  en una comunidad aledaña con su esposa y su hijo al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios , de profesión, agricultor, en granos básicos maíz y frijoles y la ganadería en pequeña escala.

Ismael conocido como una persona honesta y trabajadora, tiene más de ocho años de experiencia y trabajar estos rubros, trabaja junto con su familia en su pequeña finca de cuatro manzanas que es alta mente productiva y quiere sacarle un buen provecho explotándola en uno de los mejores rubros de la zona como es el cultivo de frijol, hoy en día  nos está solicitando un crédito, para la compra de abono, insecticida, fungicida más gastos de mano de obra.
 
Su proyección es cultivar 2.5 manzanas de frijol y comercializarlos una vez que los coseche obteniendo un buen ingreso para cancelar y cubrir los gastos de su familia lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando en los nuevos ciclos agrícolas y mejorar el nivel de vida cada día de su familia ya que es su única forma de obtener ingresos.
texts.en:
Condega is a municipality known as the “Land of Potters” because of the crafts and its hardworking people.  Ismael lives in an adjacent community with his wife and son who he must support and provide schooling for.  His profession is agriculture; he grows basic grains like corn and beans and also raises livestock on a small scale.

Ismael is known as an honest, hardworking person.  He has more than 8 years’ experience in these lines of work.  He works with his family on a small, four-manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] farm that is highly productive.  He wants to take full advantage of it exploiting it in one of the best lines of work, bean growing.  He’s asking for a loan to buy manure, insecticide, fungicide and to pay labor costs.

He’s projecting 2.5 manzanas of bean production to sell once harvested earning enough income to repay the loan and cover his family’s expenses which will allow him to continue working new growing cycles and improve his family’s standard of living since this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Darwin José

texts.es:
Darwin José vive  al sur de la capital trabaja en una universidad de Managua en el área de mantenimiento.
Darwin está solicitando a kiva un crédito  para invertirlo en la  compra de materiales de construcción como bloque, arena, cemento  ya que  tiene el proyecto de construir  un porche  para darle mayor seguridad a su casa. Ya que lo considera necesario  para la comodidad de su familia.
texts.en: Darwin José lives south of the capital and works in the maintenance department of a Managua university.  Darwin’s requesting a Kiva loan to buy building supplies like concrete blocks, sand and cement because he plans to build a porch to add more security at home.  He considers this necessary for his family’s comfort.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en: Abbas is a 21-year–old who studies at Cooperation University. His studying years are 2010 to 2014, and his faculty is management. Abbas's father is an employee in the public sector, and his is the only source of income for the family. The father can't pay university installments for his son because of high family expenses. Abbas needs a loan 2,000 Azerbaijani manats. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester so he can complete his studies. This will insure him a better life in the future.

loans.use: to pay his university installments for this semester

loans.name: Noel Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Noel Antonio vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja en el área de mantenimiento de un centro de compra de la capital desde hace 22 años.
  Noel esta  está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de zinc y  madera  para hacerle el cambio  al techo a su vivienda que está en mal  estado y con el pago de su salario se le ha hace difícil ya que su ingresos mensuales los utiliza para  los gastos de alimentación y gastos escolares.
Ala vez nos manifiesta que está muy agradecido con ceprodel y kiva porque gracias a los financiamiento ha podido mejorar su casita para darle mayor comodidad a su familia .
texts.en: Noel Antonio lives in Managua. He has worked in the maintenance department of a shopping center in the city for the past 22 years. Noel is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of zinc sheeting and wood to replace the roof of his house, which is in bad condition. It is hard to pay for this with his salary as he uses that to cover food and school expenses. At the same time he tells us that he is very grateful to CEPRODEL and Kiva as thanks to this loan he can improve his house and provide more comfort for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like zinc sheeting and wood.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es:
El señor  Israel Antonio vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja como vigilante en un centro de compra, es  padre de familia de dos pequeños  en edad escolar.
Israel nos manifiesta que  él es el único  sustento de su familia ya que su esposa se encarga de cuidar a sus hijos. Por esta razón se ve con la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de láminas de zinc y compra de manera para hacerle cambio al techo de su vivienda que al paso de los años se ha ido deteriorando y con el invierno se le ha hecho un problema porque se le pasa el agua al interior de su casa afectando a su familia.
A la vez aprovecho para agradecer a kiva por el apoyo que pueda brindar a través de ceprodel para solucionar el problema  de su vivienda
texts.en:
Sr. Israel Antonio lives in the city of Managua and works as a watchman in a shopping mall. He has two school-aged children.

Israel is the sole breadwinner in the family as his wife looks after the children. For this reason he feels the need to seek a loan to buy zinc sheeting and wood so he can renew the roof on his house which has deteriorated over time. During the winter water leaked into the house and caused problems for his family.

He wants to take this opportunity to thank Kiva for the support they provide to Ceprodel so he can overcome the problem of his house.

loans.use: buy zinc sheeting

loans.name: Francisco Rafael

texts.es: Francisco es un señor ejemplar en su familia y la comunidad por ser una persona amable, cariñoso, ya que su profesión es maestro de educación secundaria el que ejerce con el mismo carisma, es casado con un hijo al que le brinda el apoyo académico necesario para su desarrollo, este señor solicito un financiamiento para las mejora de su vivienda como es la construcción de anexo, dicho crédito lo utilizaría en la compra de hierro, zinc, perlin y mano de obra. El que le vendría a dar mejores condiciones en el ceno familiar.
texts.en: Francisco is an exemplary gentleman in his family and the community, and is known for being a kind and loving person. This follows from his profession; he is a teacher of secondary education, a role he performs with charisma. Francisco is married and has a son, to whom he offers all the necessary educational help with his development. Francisco is requesting fianancing for home improvements, mainly to construct an annex. The loan will be used to purchase iron, zinc, and roof supports, and to pay laborers. He is doing this to create better living conditions in the family's home.

loans.use: to purchase zinc sheets and roof supports, and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Vilma Lorena

texts.es: Vilma  se desempeña como maestra de educación primaria de un colegio de la localidad donde vive con 28 años de laborar en el ,ramo  de la educación, es casada con 3  hijos  a los que le brinda todo el apoyo para su desarrollo, esta señora presenta una necesidad de reparar su vivienda lo que se refiere  a la mejora de pared, ya que dicho crédito lo utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción como; cemento, ladrillo, hierro y mano de obra, para mejorar los niveles de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma works as an elementary school teacher in a school in her neighborhood.  She has 28 years’ experience in education.  She’s married with three children who she provides with all necessary support for their development.  

She needs to repair her house, specifically to improve the walls.  She will use this loan to buy building supplies like cement, bricks, iron rods and to pay labor costs to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shirts and perfume.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee de 23 años de edad, habita en casa familiar desde hace 10 años.  Ella es una joven muy trabajadora, emprendedora y visionaria. Haydee se dedica a la venta de tortillas (preparación alimenticia de masa de maíz), en el mercado de la comunidad donde habita, siendo este negocio su principal fuente de ingresos.  Desde hace mucho tiempo tiene el deseo de construir una pila que le permita reguardar el agua que extrae del pozo que posee en su casa ya que es muy difícil sacar el agua directamente del pozo cada vez que la necesita.  Por lo anterior,  solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la comprar de: arena, ladrillo, y cemento para la construcción de su pila que tanta falta le hace, confía que con esta ayuda podrá cumplir su objetivo y tendrá más tiempo para dedicarse al negocio.
texts.en:
Haydee is 23 years old, and has lived in the family home for ten years. She is described as a hard-working young woman who has an entrepreneurial spirit and a lot of ambition.  Haydee’s principle source of income is selling tortillas in the community market. She says that she prepares her tortillas nutritiously with dough made from corn. For a long time, Haydee has wanted to build a basin to store well water. She says that her home has a well, but that it is very difficult to get water directly from it every time she needs it.

Haydee is requesting this loan from Kiva and the field partner to buy sand, bricks and cement to build a basin for storing water. She says that the basin is badly needed, and she hopes that with the loan she will be able to carry out the construction and have more time to spend on her business.

loans.use: to buy sand, bricks and cement to build a basin for storing water.

loans.name: María Petrona

texts.es:
María de 50 años de edad, logro cursar quinto grado de educación básica. Se encuentra casada, su esposo trabaja en diferentes actividades, lo que salga, él esta en Estados Unidos, tuvo que emigrar para ayudar a la familia, pero la situación esta difícil y les  remesa cuando puede. Lo que obliga a María a buscar otras maneras de poder llevar ingresos al hogar. Su hijo trabaja. Ademas de este vive con ella una nieta. 


Ella se dedica a lavar y planchar ajeno, tiene 5 años de hacer este oficio, aprendió esto con su madre; también le ayudaba a su padre en las actividades agrícolas,  ella pudo ver, que esta actividad le generaba ingresos, lo hace en los momentos que no esta cuidando a su nieta. 
Ella tiene que viajar 3 días a la semana, lugar donde realiza su trabajo. La distancia es de 8 km. Y viaja en bus. 

El préstamo lo necesita para instalar una crianza de gallinas, para poder venderlas en la fiestas de fin de año, que es cuando hay gran demanda, por lo cual tiene mejores precios, tendrá ingresos extras por esta actividad.

En el futuro, desea poder crear un  negocio que le permita tener los recursos suficientes, para que a su  familia no le falte nada, que su nieta tenga  estudio, salud., cubra sus  necesidades básicas.
texts.en: Maria, 50, was able to finish the fifth grade of primary school. She is married. Her husband works in different jobs, whatever comes up. He is in the United States. He had to emigrate to help the family, but the situation is difficult and he sends remittances when he can. This means that Maria has look for other ways to bring income into the home. Her son works. Also, a granddaughter lives with her. She works washing and ironing for other people. She has been doing this for five years and she learned it with her mother. She also helped her father with his farm work. She could see that this activity would bring in income. She does it when she is not looking after her granddaughter. She has to travel three days a week, to the place where she works. It's a distance of 8 kilometers, and she travels on the bus. She needs the loan to put in a pen for hens, in order to sell them at the end-of-year parties. This is when there is greater demand, so she has better prices. She will have extra income from this activity. In the future, she wants to be able to create a business what will allow to have sufficient resources so that her family wants for nothing, and so that her granddaughter has an education, her health, and her basic expenses covered.

loans.use: to install a place to raise hens.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur lives in the village of Syunik with his parents, sister and brother. For three years already, Artur has been giving piano classes at a local cultural center. With his kind and hard work, Artur teaches local children to play the piano with great love and care. Together with his teacher's work, Artur is also earning money by playing for different private events. Artur is a very talented musician, and, over these years of hard work, he has been able to earn a reputation in the region.

Now, to be able to have his own synthesizer, Artur has applied for this loan. He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. So this loan will help Artur to purchase a synthesizer and continue his talented and important work for the community.

loans.use: to pay for a synthesizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar panel for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Antonia Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Antonia es una micro empresaria de su comunidad y su fuente principal de ingresos es la venta de tortillas al por mayor y al detalle, esto lo hace desde su casa de habitación.
Doña Antonia cuenta con la clientela como ser pulperías y empleados de diferentes fabricas de la ciudad tiene de dedicarse a esta actividad desde hace 14 años y con dicho negocio pudo construir su de su casa.
Doña Antonia está solicitando otro préstamo ya que el anterior fue de mucha ayuda porque realizo las mejoras en el fogón que tenia porque le consumía mucha leña, ahora ella quiere comprar maíz y leña porque en el invierno es difícil conseguirlo a buen precio, ella sueña con tener una tortillera semi industrial y poder incrementar sus ventas y así sus ganancias para poder retirarse un poco del humo de fuego ya que le hace daño a su salud. 



Danlí, Honduras – Septiembre 2013
texts.en:
Antonia’s a micro businesswoman in her community and her main source of income is selling tortillas at wholesale and retail; she does this at home.

Antonia’s customers are grocery stores and factory employees in the city.  She’s been in this occupation for 14 years and was able to build her house thanks to this business.

Antonia is asking for another loan since her previous one was of great help to her because she repaired the stove she had that consumed much wood.  Now, she wants to buy corn and firewood because they are difficult to get in winter at a good price.  She dreams with having a semi-industrial tortilla shop and to be able to increase her sales and profits to be able to retire a bit from the fire’s smoke that damages her health.

Danlí, Honduras – September, 2013

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja en una empresa del estado.
Casado con dos pequeños hijos los cuales están en edad escolar 
Juan Carlos está solicitando un crédito a kiva para invertirlo en la compra de zinc para cambiar  el techado de su casa ya que está en mal estado y esto es incomodo para su familia.
También quiere agradecer mucho a kiva  y ceprodel  por la oportunidad que le dan para mejorar su vivienda
texts.en:
Juan Carlos lives in the city of Managua and works for a state company. He is married with two small children who are both in school.

Juan Carlos is requesting a loan from Kiva to invest in buying zinc to change the roof on his home because it is in rough shape. This makes things uncomfortable for his family. He is also very grateful to Kiva and Ceprodel for the opportunity they've provided to improve his home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Neftalí

texts.es:
El señor Neftalí vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja en una universidad de Managua muy conocido en su centro de trabajo por tener  37 años de laborar en esa institución.
Don Neftalí está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de arena, cemento y pago de mano de obra   ya que tiene el proyecto de repellar las paredes de su casa  porque con el invierno las paredes se humedecen mucho 
A la vez  manifiesta su agradecimiento a kiva por este financiamiento por que estos le han servido para mejorar su vivienda y hacer tener un techo digno y cómodo para su familia.
texts.en: Neftalí lives in the city of Managua and works in a university in Managua. He is well known in his workplace because he has been at the institution for 37 years. Neftali is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of sand and cement and to pay workers to whitewash the walls of his house, because during the winter the walls become very wet. At the same time he expresses his gratitude to Kiva for the financing because these loans have helped him improve his house and have a decent and comfortable home for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: José Ernesto

texts.es:
José Ernesto vive en Managua trabaja en una empresa del estado casado  tiene un hijo en edad escolar.
José solicitad un crédito a kiva para para la compra de materiales de construcción como bloques cemento, arena, hierro para la construcción de un  anexo en su casa ya que esto le va a servir para darle una comodidad a su familia. agradeciendo a kiva por el apoyo    que le están dado para poder realizar este proyecto de mejoramiento de su vivienda
texts.en:
José Ernesto lives in Managua and works in a state enterprise. He is married with one son who is of school age. 

José is requesting a loan from Kiva to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, sand, and iron to build an annex to his house, which will allow his family to live more comfortably. He is thankful to Kiva for the support they have given him to carry out his home improvement project.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Catarina Erneste

texts.pt:
A Catarina  é  casada e mae de dois filhos que estudam perto de sua casa.
Ela trabalha como professora durante o dia e, de noite vai para a Escola
 
Ela precisa do empréstimo para comprar material de construçao(chapas de zinco, barrotes, varroes, pedra e cimento ) para aplicar na construcao de sua sasa.
O Seu maior sonho e de terminar a sua casa para melhorar as condicoes de aconchego da sua familia,
formar se no ensino superior e comprar uma viatura para o transporte pessoal
texts.en:
Catarina is married and has two children who attend a school that's near her house.
She works as a teacher by day and at night she goes to school.
She needs the loan in order to purchase construction supplies (metal sheets, beams, rods, rocks and cement) that she'll use to build her house.
Her biggest dream is finishing her house so that she can improve her family's living conditions.
She also wishes to graduate from college and purchase a vehicle for personal transportation.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (rods, cement and metal sheets) so she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Anita

texts.pt:
A anita tem 40 anos de idade é solteira e mae de 2 filhas com as quais vive na casa propria e todas frequentam a escola uma das quais esta no ensino  secundario.
A sua base de sustento é o negocio. ela trabalha todos osn dias  vendendo frutas na estrada onde se localizada o seu estabelecimento comercial.
 
Para alem do negocio que faz,tambem é criadora de frangos.Precisa do emprestimo para comprar pintos racao e medicamentos para criar e revender. 
 seu maior sonho é de construir  as suas proprias capoeiras, pois neste momento esta a usar capoeiras da familia. 
O seu maior desafio é a escolarizacao das suas filhas.
texts.en:
Anita is 40 years old and single. She has two daughters and lives with them in a house that she owns. Both her daughters attend school and one of them is in high school.
Her means of livelihood is her business. She works everyday selling fruit by the roadside where her store is located.
Aside from her business, she also raises chickens. She needs the loan in order to purchase feed, medicine, and chicks for raising and re-selling.
Her biggest dream is to finish building her coops, because she's currently using her family's coops.
Her biggest challenge is her children's schooling.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed and medicine so she can increase the number of chicks she raises.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie is 39 years and married.  She lives in Compound #3.  She has not attended school because her parents did not have the money to support her in school. 

She says that for 15 years now she has been involved in running a food market, helping herself  to improve her family's living condition. She started this business with a loan given to her by her friends. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil, rice, salt, vita, etc., to expand her business. Her plan is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice, salt, vita, etc., to expand her business.

loans.name: Alex Alfonso

texts.es:
San Sebastián de yali  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Jinotega, identificado  por su área boscosa y muchas especies de orquídeas, con un terreno apto para la agricultura, ganadería y un buen comercio, vive Alex con su esposa y tres hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios.

Trabaja para la empresa de acueductos Enacal como cajero desde hace 19 años, es conocido como una persona honrada y trabajadora.

Recientemente visito las oficinas de Ceprodel y está solicitando un crédito para  mejorar su vivienda  ya que no está en buenas condiciones y necesita comprar hiero, alambre de amarre, cemento, arena y pagar la mano de obra utilizada. 

El plantea que conoce la importancia de darle un mejor techo a su familia ya que tendrá condiciones de ambiente más saludable lo que les permitirá estar en un mejor confort familiar cada día.
texts.en:
San Sebastian de Yali is a town located in the northern part of the Jinotega department, which is known for its forests and many species of orchids. Its land is good for farming, ranching, and good commerce. Alex lives here with his wife and three children, whom he has to support and send to school.

He has worked for the aqueduct company Enacal as a cashier for 19 years. He is known as an honest and hard-working person.

He recently visited the Cedprodel office and is requesting a loan to improve his home because it is in poor condition. He needs to buy iron, mooring wire, cement, sand, and pay for labor costs.

He says that he knows the importance of providing his family with a better roof because they will have a healthier environment. This will make his family more comfortable every day.

loans.use: to improve his home by buying iron, mooring wire, cement, sand, and labor costs.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 30-year-old Lebanese man who is single. 

He has owned a shop since 2000 where he trades in charcoal. He sells his products to multiple dealers and merchants. His shop is situated in the same town where he lives, and people from his community also visit him to buy charcoal from him. 

Today he looks forward to borrowing a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase charcoal in large quantity. 

Hasan states that the loan will impact positively on his career, and he is sure that his sales revenues will be elevated.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Fernando Junior

texts.pt:
O fernando vive maritalmente e tem um filho menor que nao estuda pelo facto de ter uma deficiencia mental.
 a sua base de sustento é o negocio, ele trabalha todos os dias das 07h ate as 18 excepto os domingos.

Com o emprestimo pretende comprar productos alimentares( refregerantes, bolos e diversos )para revender no seu estabelecimento comercial.

 Ele tem como sonhos construcao de uma mercearia maior para fazer o seu negocio, sonha tambem ampliar a sua casa
texts.en:
Fernando is married and has an underage son who doesn't attend school because he's mentally handicapped.
His means of livelihood is his business. He works everyday from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m., except on Sundays.

With the loan he intends to purchase foodstuffs (soft drinks, cakes, etc.) for re-selling in his store.

His dream is to build a larger grocery store where he can conduct his business. He also dreams of enlarging his house.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuffs (soft drinks, cakes, etc.).

loans.name: Rufo

texts.es:
San Sebastián de yali  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Jinotega, identificado  por su área boscosa y muchas especies de orquídeas con un terreno apto para la agricultura y ganadería. En una comunidad aledaña conocida como las guayabas , Vive el señor Rufo, con su esposa y sus cuatro  hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios, él de profesión, agricultor, en el área de granos básicos, es conocido  como una persona honesta y trabajadora con más de 30 años de experiencia.

Su propiedad tiene un área de 110 manzanas de extensión todas aptas para cultivo maíz y frijol y la ganadería  

Recientemente visitó  nuestras oficinas y está solicitando un crédito para compra de abono, fungicidas, foliares y gastos en mano de obra para darle mantenimiento al cultivo de frijol  donde piensa salir beneficiado. El impacto y beneficios que tendrá  él y su familia son de una forma positiva ya que trabajan  su finca a través de este rubro cada año,  mejorando su nivel de vida y condiciones económicas con los ingresos obtenidos en cada cosecha realizada.
texts.en:
San Sebastián de Yali is a municipality located in the northern part of Jinotega department, known for its forest and many species of orchids, with a suitable terrain for agriculture and livestock farming. In a surrounding community known as Guayabas lives Rufo with his wife and four children, for whom he has to provide and educate.

Rufo, who cultivates basic grains, is known as an honest and hardworking person with over 30 years of experience. His property covers an area of 110 manzanas [equivalent to 1.75 acres], all which is suitable for the cultivation of corn and beans and for raising cattle.

He recently visited our offices and is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, fungicides, and foliar fertilizers, and to pay for labor to help maintain the bean crop in areas where he thinks it will be beneficial. He expects a positive impact for his family, since they work their farm following this routine every year, improving their standard of living and economic conditions with the income earned from each crop.

loans.use: to buy supplies (fertilizer, fungicide, foliar fertilizers) and to pay for labor

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is 45 years old and married, the mother of three. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future.  

Ten years ago she began sewing work in her house. Her daughter also assists her in making elegant dresses.  She makes a good amount of income and counts a good client list. 

However, due to a lack of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 20,000. It will help her to purchase more spools of threads along with packs of zippers and ribbons in various colors. 

She expects a boost in her earnings and dreams of providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of threads along with packs of zippers and ribbons in various colors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Olinda Salvador

texts.pt:
A Olinda tem 31 anos de idade, solteira e mae de uma filha menor de idade para frequentar a escola.
A sua base de sustento é o negócio. Ela trabalha 08 horas por dia fazendo distribuicao de productos e cobrando os valores nos seus clientes.

Ela precisa do empréstimo  para comprar produtos diversos( bebidas e carnes )para revender.
 O seu maior sonho é construir sua propria casa e progredir na sua actividade comercial.
texts.en:
Olinda is 31 years old and single. She has a daughter who's still too young to attend school.
Her means of livelihood is her business. She works 8 hours a day delivering merchandise and collecting payments from her customers.

She needs the loan in order to purchase assorted merchandise (beverages and meat) for re-selling.
Her biggest dream is building a house of her own and making progress in her retail business.

loans.use: to purchase assorted merchandise (beverages and meat).

loans.name: Shafia

texts.en: Shafia is a 39-year-old married woman and the mother of six children. She has been running a business of animals' sales and purchases with her husband for the last six years. She buys animals (baby goats and baby cows) at low prices, raises them, and then her husband sells them out in the market at higher prices. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. Currently she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase two more goats. She is in her second  loan cycle with a good repayment history.  She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Sebe Allahye Group

texts.fr:
Mme PAGOMDGOALMA represente le groupe SEBE ALLAHYE. Elle est veuve et mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 40ans et le moins âgé a 35ans. Personne ne va à l’école et elle a 03personnes en charge.
Mme vend des pagnes depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de la ville. Ses clients sont les femmes et les jeunes filles.
Elle veut s’acheter 07complets de pagnes.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut s’occuper de ses petits fils. Mme ambitionne construire une maison d’habitation.
texts.en: Mrs. Pagomdgoalma represents the Sebe Allahye group. She is a widow and had two children. The eldest is 40 years old, and the youngest 35. She has no children in school. She has three dependents. Pagomdgoalma has been selling traditional “pagnes” fabric for 10 years. She stocks up at the main market of her town. Her customers are women and girls. She would like to buy seven sets of “pagnes.” She would like to use her revenue to take care of her grandchildren. Her goal is to build a house to live in.

loans.use: to buy seven sets of traditional fabric.

loans.name: Gulnar

texts.en:
Gulnar is 19 years old and a young woman from Baku city. She studies at Pedagogical State University. She entered this university in 2013 in the faculty of mathematics and computer science. 

She is not working, even part time, because it is impossible due to a lot of lessons and study hours. That is why her parents pay for her education. Life is more expensive every year, and to pay her education fee, Gulnar applied for 2,000 AZN. This will help pay her tuition fee in advance, and complete studies successfully.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee in advance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Fatmeh is a 49-year-old single woman. She is from Lebanon. In 2009, she opened her own shop and started selling gifts, in addition to accessories and perfumes. With her loan requested from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., she will increase her store’s inventory of accessories, gifts, and new perfumes with unique odors. 

In the future, Fatima hopes to expand her business more, attract added customers, and gain higher income.

loans.use: to increase her store’s inventory of accessories, gifts, and new perfumes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Adila

texts.en:
Adila is 24 years old and single, from Baku city. Thanks to her father's daily hard work as a taxi driver and her mother's work as a secondary school teacher, Adila studies at Baku and Cooperation College. 

Her father and mother are trying to pay for her education. Last year, however, it become harder because of some family problems. Adila has applied for an AZN 1,700 loan to pay for her education`s two years. 

She awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for her education`s two years.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 40 years old, male, and married. He has five (5) children: 15, 12,10, 7, and 5 years old respectively, whom he supports. He was introduced to KADET Ltd. by a Kadet officer. He has a retail shop. He has been in this business for ten years, which is located at Mtangani.

In his business, he earns a monthly income of KES 29,080. He is taking his fifth loan of KES 90,000, which he intends to use by adding stocks to his business by buying sugar, rice, maize flour, salt, fats, cooking oil, and tea leaves. 

His previous loan of KES 80,000 was paid back successfully. Joseph will use the anticipated profit to expand his business by making it a wholesale shop. His hopes and dreams for his future business and family are to grow his business and educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for his business, such as maize flour, sugar, rice, salt, fats, cooking oil, and tea leaves, to sell.

loans.name: Eliazar Miguel

texts.es:
San Sebastián de yali  un municipio que está ubicado en la parte norte del departamento de Jinotega, identificado  por su área boscosa y muchas especies de orquídeas con un terreno apto para la agricultura y ganadería. En una comunidad aledaña conocida como el vijagual  , Vive el señor Eliazar , con su esposa y sus tres  hijos al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios, él de profesión, agricultor, en el área de granos básicos, es conocido  como una persona honesta y trabajadora con más de 15 años de experiencia.

Su propiedad tiene un área de nueve  manzanas de extensión todas aptas para cultivo maíz, frijol y hortalizas. 

Recientemente visitó  nuestras oficinas y está solicitando un crédito para compra de abono, fungicidas, foliares y gastos en mano de obra para darle mantenimiento al cultivo de frijol y papa  donde piensa salir beneficiado. El impacto y beneficios que tendrá  él y su familia son de una forma positiva ya que trabajan  su finca a través de estos rubros cada año, mejorando sus  condiciones económicas con los ingresos obtenidos en cada cosecha realizada.
texts.en:
San Sebastián de Yali,  is a municipality located in the northern part of Jinotega Department, known for its forested area and many species of orchids, with land suitable for agriculture and livestock-raising. 

In an adjoining community known as El Vijagual, Eliazar lives with his wife and his three children whom he has the duty to support and educate.

A farmer by occupation, growing basic staples, he is known as an honest and hard-working person with more than 15 years of experience. His property is 9 manzanas in area (about 16 acres), all of which are suitable for growing corn, beans and vegetables. 

Recently he visited our offices, requesting a loan to buy manure, fungicides, herbicides and pay for labor to maintain his bean and potato crops, where he hopes to come out with a profit.  

The impact and benefits will be positive for him and his family, as they operate their farm and grow these crops each year, improving their economic situation with the income obtained in each successful harvest.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies (manure, fungicide, herbicides) and pay for labor.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard lives in the Litein area of Kenya. He has no children and has been a dairy farmer for two years. His primary income sources are milk and crops.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'keeping dairy cows.' His biggest challenge is 'animal diseases.' Animals on the farm have been given the names of 'Bois, Tuyai.'

Benard was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: 'the interest rate is a bit lower as compared to other income generating activities.'  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'that they offer loans to those in a group.'

His highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked 'How will this loan benefit his family', Benard replied 'in venturing into other income generating activities.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Benard owns the following: 'cow' but does not own 'pig, poultry, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net' but does not have 'electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV, DVD'.

loans.use: To purchase poultry.

loans.name: Malak

texts.en:
Malak is a 25-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and only child. She owns a beauty salon since 2007, where she serves women only. In addition, her husband works at a local water station, and they cooperate with each other to collect money, as much as necessary, to be able to pay the operating expenses. 

And today, Malak is asking to borrow a youth loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., to renovate her salon and purchase new tools. Malak aims to strengthen her business operation by expanding her work and targeting wider clientele to increase her income.

loans.use: to renovate her salon and purchase new tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Malabawena

texts.fr: Malabawena âgée de 58ans revend depuis 2005 des charbons de bois à domicile. Elle s'approvisionne à Anié(localité située à environ 200km) et sollicite son troisième crédit pour acheter des marchandises. Le profit l'aidera à renforcer son activité et assurer le bien - être de la famille(Mariée à un retraité, elle a 04 enfants dont 01 seul scolarisé).
texts.en:
Malabawena is 58 years old, and since 2005 has been selling charcoal at home. She resupplies in Anié (town about 200 km away) and is requesting her third loan to buy goods.

The profits will help to strengthen her business and ensure her family's well-being (married to a pensioner, she has four children of whom only one attends school).

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Larry Raúl

texts.es:
El señor Larry Raúl vive en la ciudad de Masaya de donde viaja diariamente a la capital para integrase diariamente a su centro de trabajo donde se desempeña como guarda de seguridad en un centro de compra   de la capital.Casado,  su esposa se dedica al cuido de sus hijos que están en edad escolar.
El señor Larry está solicitando  un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de zinc para hacerle el cambio de techo a su vivienda que está en mal estado por el uso de los años y esto le causado molestia cuando llueve porque se le pasa el agua al interior de su humilde casa. a la vez nos manifiesta que está muy agradecido con ceprodel y kiva por que los crédito que a obtenido los ha utilizado en mejorar poco a poco su vivienda para darle mayor comodidad a su seres queridos .
texts.en:
Larry Raul lives in the city of Masaya. He travels daily to the capital to reach his workplace where he works as a security guard in a shopping center. He is married and his wife works caring for their children, who are of school age.

Larry is seeking a loan in order to invest it in the purchase of tin roofing material in order to replace the roof of his home as it is in poor condition due to wearing out over the years. This causes problems when it rains because the water leaks into his modest house. At the same time, he states that he is very grateful to Ceprodel and Kiva because he has used the loans that he has obtained to gradually improve his home to provide greater comfort to his loved ones.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Sebaye

texts.en: Sebaye is a 20-year-old young girl who lives together with her mother and two sisters. She studies at Pedagogical State University. She entered university in 2011 and will complete it in 2015. She is on her third year of study in the faculty of pedagogical. Her dream is to work as a teacher after graduating from her studies. Sebaye is not working, hence her parents pay her education fee. Now she needs to pay for the last two years and for this purpose applied for 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijani new manat.

loans.use: to pay for last two years of studies.

loans.name: Zouheir

texts.en:
Zouheir is 55-year-old married man. He is from Lebanon and lives with his wife and six children who are still attending school. In 2010, he opened a cafeteria where he began providing his customers with coffee, Nescafe and cappuccino. Besides this, his wife owns a cafeteria as well, next to a university, which is just a perfect place to attract students on their breaks. 

Today, Zouheir is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to redecorate his cafeteria and purchase coffee machinery to respond quickly to customers' demands. In the future, Zouheir hopes to expand his operation by serving sandwiches from his cafeteria.

loans.use: to redecorate his cafeteria and purchase coffee machinery.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Дилором живет далеко от города в сельской местности в старом домике, который не отвечает стандартам жилья. Ей 47 лет, она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она основная кормилица в семье, так как ее дети еще не имеют большой доход, а ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и не отправляет достаточно денег. Она обратилась за займом с целью того, чтобы купить строительные материалы как цемент, древесина и т.п. Она должна отремонтировать свой дом, так как ее дом имеет плохое состояние. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 2000 сомони. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilorom lives in a village far away from the city, in an old house, which does not meet the standards of housing. She is 47 years old, married, and raising three children. She is the main bread-winner in the family. Her children don't have a large income yet, and her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, and does not send sufficient money home. 

Dilorom applied for a loan with the aim to purchase building materials such as cement, wood and similar. She needs to repair her house, as the house is in bad condition. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,000 somoni. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials, such as cement and wood, for repairing her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёра жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Сайёра в ИМОНе кредитуется повторно. Она участвовала на курсе «Добейся Успеха» и организовала свой бизнес. Она организовала свой бизнес скотоводством. Она постепенно развевает свой бизнес. Она потратила все свои ресурсы для развития своего бизнеса, и теперь она не имеет денег, чтобы купить школьные одежды и школьные принадлежности для своих детей. Ее дети школьники и учатся отлично. Сайёра запрашивает займ на сумму 7000 сомони. Этот займ поможет ей создать условию для своих детей, чтобы они получили образование. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sayora is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She is married and raising four children. Sayora takes a loan with IMON for the second time. She participated in the training "To Get Ahead" and started her own business of livestock breeding. Stepwise she developed her business. 

Sayora spent all her resources on developing the business, and currently she does not have money to purchase school clothing and school supplies for her children. Her children are of school age and study well. 

Sayora requests a loan in the amount of 7,000 somoni. This loan will help her create good conditions for her children, so they can be educated. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase school uniforms and school supplies for her children

loans.name: Rajab

texts.ru: Рачаб родился в районе А.Джоми и по сей день живет там с женой и тремя детьми. Ему 48 лет. Он занимается скотоводством. Рачаб в течение 17 лет разводит крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Этой деятельностью занимался его дед, отец и он тоже унаследовал их опыт в этой сфере. Параллельно с животноводством Рачаб работает на грядке, таким образом он обеспечивает семью здоровой пищей. На сегодняшний день все его внимание уделено скотам и сейчас в его скотном дворе всего две коровы. Рачаб хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить бизнес. Он просит кредит для покупки трех коров и корма для животных. Желаем ему достижения своих целей.
texts.en:
Rajab was born in the A.Jomi region, and to this day lives there, together with his wife and three children. He is 48 years old. He works with cattle breeding. For a period of 17 years Rajab has bred cattle for sale. His grandfather and father also worked in this business, and he learned from their experience in this area. 

In parallel with cattle breeding, Rajab works in the garden, and this way he provides his family with healthy food. Currently all his attention is given to the cattle and now he has two cows in his cattle yard. Rajab would like to increase the number of cattle and expand his business. He requests a loan to purchase three cows and fodder for the animals. We hope he achieves his goals.

loans.use: to purchase three cows and fodder, to increase the number of cattle

loans.name: Pastora

texts.es: Doña Pastora, tiene 61 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, tiene un hijo y reside en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Anteriormente vendía mercadería como ropa y perfumes. Hace 2 años que tiene un negocio de una pulpería donde ofrece diferentes productos alimenticios como ser refrescos, lácteos, productos de limpieza, arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos, pastas condimentos, achinería etc. El préstamo que solicito es por 7,500 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de más productos para el negocio como arroz,frijoles,carnes refrescos,lacteos,productos de limpieza etc. Con el proposito de  incrementar las ganancias ya que pretende comprar al por mayor y también por la necesidad de mejorar los ingresos. Su meta es mejorar su casa y ampliar un poco más el negocio y comprar un taxi para ponerlo a trabajar.
texts.en:
Pastora is 61 years old, widowed, and has one child. She lives in the municipality of Tela in Atlántida. She used to sell merchandise such as clothes and perfumes. Since two years back her business is a corner store where she sells products such as soft drinks, dairy products, cleaning products, rice, sugar, bread, eggs, pasta, condiments, knick-knacks, etc. 

She is requesting a loan of 7,500 HNL that she will use to buy more products for her business such as rice, beans, meat, soft drinks, dairy products, cleaning products, etc. This will increase her profits since she will buy everything wholesale. Her aim is to improve her house, expand her business and buy a taxi in order to offer taxi services.

loans.use: to stock her store with merchandise

loans.name: Donaldo

texts.es: Donaldo, tiene 33 años de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos y vive en Taulabe, Comayagua. Donaldo siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura. Hace 10 años que se dedica a la producción de café y caña de azúcar. La producción de café la vende en pergamino en el mercado local y de la caña elabora dulce para vender. También en temporadas el presta servicio de jornal a sus compañeros agricultores. El ha solicitado varios prestamos en ODEF, con este actual es el quinto ciclo y es por 11,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar abonos y pago de limpieza para sus cultivos de café y caña y poder mejorar la producción. El plan que tiene es ampliar una parcela mas de café para mejorar los ingresos.
texts.en:
Donaldo is 33 years old, married, has three children and lives in Taulabe, Comayagua. Donaldo has always worked in agriculture, he cultivates coffee and sugarcane since 10 years back. He sells his coffee wrapped in parchment at the local market. He uses the sugar cane to make sweets that he sells. During some seasons he works as a day laborer for his fellow farmers. 

He has requested several loans at ODEF, this is his fifth loan and it is for 11,000 HNL. He will use it to buy compost and to pay for the clearing of his coffee and sugar cane cultivations. This will increase his production.

His plan is to expand his cultivations with another plot of coffee in order to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy compost and to clear his cultivations of weed

loans.name: Anabel

texts.es:
La señora Anabel vive en la cuidad de Managua administradora de empresa trabaja en una universidad de Managua desde hace 7 años.
Doña Anabel atraves de ceprodel le solicita un financiamiento a kiva ya que necesita  invertirlo en la compra de piedra, cemento, arena ,  entre otros materiales para construir un cuarto ya que lo considera necesario para la comodidad de su familia.
texts.en: Anabel lives in the city of Managua and has been working for seven years at the university as a business administrator.  She is requesting a loan through Ceprodel and Kiva to buy bricks, cement, sand and other construction materials to build a room to make her family more comfortable.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as bricks, sand and cement.

loans.name: Julia Yorlene

texts.es:
La joven Julia Yorlene, es secretaria ejecutiva de una universidad de la ciudad de León, desde hace dos años. Inicia sus labores desde 07:00 am hasta las 04:00 pm este  horario de lunes a viernes. Realiza esta labor para el sustento de su familia y apoyo a sus padres.
  
La joven Julia Yorlene, el crédito  que solicito  a Ceprodel fue utilizado para gastos médicos y compra de medicinas, lo que le permitirá recuperar su salud y así continuar con sus labores diarias, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado mejor su calidad de vida comprando electrodomésticos entre otros accesorios.
texts.en:
Julia Yorlene is a young woman who has been working as an executive secretary at the university in the city of León for two years.  She works from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday.  This is how she earns an income to support her family and help her parents.

Julia Yorlene is requesting a loan from Ceprodel to pay for medical expenses and medicines so she can recover her health and continue her work routine.  With the previous loans she was able to improve her quality of life by buying domestic appliances and other accessories.

loans.use: to pay personal medical expenses.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.es: La señora Erlinda, es una persona de 21 años de edad de estado civil soltera, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con un dependiente económico a su cargo el cual es su pequeño hijo, vive en una vivienda alquilada de su tía, la vivienda es de tipo rustico, que se halla ubicado en la comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica  principal es la venta de los productos de una empresa ( productos medicinales para cura varias enfermedades) en ese entendido la señora Erlinda  comercializa estos productos principalmente en la feria semanal de Tíraque, en tal sentido la señora Erlinda  solicita capital de operación para la compra de los productos medicinales, ya que actualmente por la venta de estos productos  es su principal fuente de ingreso económico.
texts.en:
Erlinda, 21, is single and has a primary education.  She and her small dependant son live with her aunt in a rustic rental home in the community of Tiraque.  She earns a living selling a certain brand of medicinal products for different illnesses at the weekly market in Tiraque.

She is requesting a loan to buy natural medicines since this is her only source of income.

loans.use: to increase work capital to buy natural medicines.

loans.name: Ramona Del Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Ramona del Rosario es comerciante  en unos de los Mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de león, empieza sus labores a las 7:00 am preparando y arreglando sus productos que ofrecerá a  su clientela, realiza compras al por mayor de sus productos 2 veces por semana.

Doña Ramona inicia su puesto fijo con un capital de C$ 3,000; producto de préstamos anteriores realizados, es madre soltera con 2 hijos a su cargo al igual que sus nietos.

El crédito que está solicitando la señora Ramona del Rosario a Ceprodel  será utilizado para la compra de productos al por mayor como es acido séptico, achote, entre otros, que servirá para mejorar los ingresos dándole un mejor bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Ramona del Rosario is a merchant at one of the busiest markets in the city of Leon.  She starts work at 7:00 a.m. arranging her products to sell to her customers.  Twice a week she buys produce from wholesale dealers.

Ramona started her business with a fixed capital of C$ 3,000 from previous loans.  She is a single mother who cares for her two children and grandchildren.

The loan she is requesting from Ceprodel is to buy wholesale items such as hydrochloric acid and spice so she can increase her income and improve her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy hydrochloric acid and spice.

loans.name: Esperanza Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Esperanza del Socorro es comerciante  en unos de los Mercados de la ciudad de león, empieza sus labores a las 10:00 am y finalizándolas a las 4:00 pm, es madre soltera de 8 hijos de los cuales ninguno está a su cargo. Doña Ramona inicia su puesto fijo con un capital de C$ 3,000; producto de préstamos anteriores realizados.

El crédito que está solicitando la señora Ramona del Rosario a Ceprodel  será utilizado para la compra de productos al por mayor como son: Televisores y Equipos de Sonido, entre otros artículos, que servirá para mejorar los ingresos brindándole mayores ingresos y mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Esperanza del Socorro is a merchant at one of the markets in the city of León.  She works from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. and is the mother of eight children who are now independent.  Ramona started her business with C$ 3,000 from previous loans.

The loan being requested now by Ramona del Rosario from Ceprodel is to buy wholesale products such as TV's and sound equipment, among other items.  This will improve her income and quality of life.

loans.use: To buy TV sets and sound equipment.

loans.name: Lorenza Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Lorenza del Socorro es comerciante  en unos de los Mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de león, empieza sus labores a las 6:00 am preparando y arreglando sus productos que ofrecerá a  su clientela, es madre soltera con 3 hijos de los cuales 1 está a su cargo, se dedica a este negocio desde hace dieciséis  años para el sustento de su familia. 

El  crédito que  solicito a Ceprodel será utilizado para comprar por mayor su mercadería tales como: gaseosas, agua, azúcar y fruta para la elaboración de los refrescos, lo cual le permitirá obtener mayor  ganancia  la que le ayudara  a realizar sus  sueños.
texts.en:
Lorenza del Socorro is a merchant at one of the busiest markets in León. She starts working at 6 am, preparing and organizing the products that she will sell to her clients. She is a single mother of three children whereof one is still in her care. She has been running this business for 16 years in order to maintain her family. 

With the loan she is requesting at CEPRODEL she will buy wholesale merchandise such as soda, water, sugar, and fruits for the elaboration of soft drinks. This will allow her to increase her profits and help her to realize her dreams.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juices, water, sugar, and more

loans.name: Claudia Victoria

texts.es:
La Señora Claudia Victoria, es docente de uno de los colegios de la ciudad de León, desde hace veinticinco años. Sale de su casa a las 12:30 pm e inicia sus labores desde 01:00 pm hasta las 05:45 pm este  horario de lunes a viernes y los días domingos de 08:00 am a  04:00 pm, es madre soltera de una hija. Realiza estas labores para el sustento de su familia.

Doña Claudia Victoria, el crédito  que solicito  a Ceprodel fue utilizado para gastos escolares de su hija permitiéndole mejor la educación de la misma.
texts.en:
Claudia Victoria is a teacher at one of the schools in León since 25 years back. Monday to Friday she leaves her home at 12:30 pm and works from 1 pm until 5:45 pm. On Sundays she works from 8 am until 4 pm. She is the single mother of one daughter. She works in order to maintain her family. 

The loan that Claudia Victoria requested from CEPRODEL was used to pay for her daughter's educational expenses, allowing her to get a better education.

loans.use: to pay for educational expenses

loans.name: Mouein

texts.en:
Mouein is 49-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and four children who attend school. He has worked in the agricultural field for the past 20 years. In 2010, he started to invest in lands where he cultivates citrus products. His wife is jobless at this time so he is the only income source for the family. 

Today, Mouein wants to make use of a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to implement an irrigation system in his orchard. Water will help him to grow faster his crops and therefore his sales will augment and therefore his profits.

loans.use: to implement an irrigation system.

loans.name: Lida

texts.en:
Lida is 25 years old, an energetic young woman from Bolnisi District, Georgia. She’s married with one child. Lida’s retired grandmother lives with her as well and works as a cleaner at the local wine factory in spite of her old age. Lida is self-employed and earns a living through trading clothes. She has regular customers among her community members who give her good profit, but the income from this business is not enough for the family.

Today, Lida needs financial support to start up new business in her district. She wishes to purchase detergents, shampoos, soaps and various cleaning products and set up a small store. According her estimations, her initiative will be lucrative, as the store is located in a crowded street and there are no similar stores nearby. 

Lida will work as a saleslady herself and her husband will assist her to run the business. The couple will generate income and they will increase their spending to satisfy their daily needs. Lida will work hard and make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase detergents and cleaning products for resale.

loans.name: Aminatou

texts.fr: Afin d'acheter des céréales pour revendre au marché, madame Aminatou fait sa toute première demande à WAGES pour atteindre son objectif.  Mariée, elle a 03 enfants dont 01 scolarisé. Elle espère augmenter son stock et assurer le bien - être de la famille.
texts.en: In order to buy cereals for resale at the market, this is Mrs. Aminatou's first request to Wages to achieve her goal. She is married with three children of whom one attends school. She hopes to increase her stock and ensure her family's well-being.

loans.use: To buy cereals.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Pour aider son conjoint dans les charges du foyer, Afi a démarré son activité de charbons de bois et de piment à domicile. Ses achats se font à Lomé et Bassar. Démarré en 1998, elle est mariée à un maçon carreleur et mère de 04 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Le profit l'aidera à assurer l'épanouissement de la famille et augmenter son chiffre d'affaire.
texts.en: To help her husband to cope with the household expenses, Afi started up a business selling charcoal and chilies from home. She buys her stock at Lome and Bassar. She started up her business in 1998. She is married to a tile layer and has four children of which two attend school. The profit will help her ensure the family's well-being and increase her revenue.

loans.use: To buy charcoal and hot peppers.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Coiffeuse de profession, Abla a ouvert son atelier en 2003. En plus de son activité, elle revend des produits cosmétiques et sollicite son second crédit pour acheter plus de marchandises. Le gain réalisé l'aidera à participer à l'épanouissement de la famille et renforcer son activité. Âgée de 27ans, elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants tous scolarisés. Ils ont entre 07 et 05ans.
texts.en: Abla, who is a hairdresser, opened her salon in 2003. In addition to her activity, she sells cosmetic products and requests a second credit to purchase more stock. The benefits will enable her to contribute to her family's well-being and build up her business. She is 27 years old and is married with two children who both attend school. They are between five and seven years old.

loans.use: To buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Sayyare

texts.en: Sayyare is 21-year-old student of Baku Ladies University. She entered university in 2012 and will complete it in 2016. She studies very well and always gets A grades. She is not working because studying takes all her time. Sayyare's father is the only one who is working in the family and it has become harder to cover family needs when another child in their family entered university.  Now expenses have doubled and to cover tuition fees for Sayyare, her father applied for 2000 AZN.

loans.use: to cover tuition fees.

loans.name: Samad

texts.en: Samad is a 21-year-old student at Tefekkur University. Samad studied well at high school and hopes that he can also successfully graduate from university and become a good specialist. He is planning to work in his field after graduation to start helping his parents financially. His parents are currently facing a financial crisis which does not allow them to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for a 2000 azn loan. He awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 22-year-old single man from Lebanon. Currently, he is studying Business Administration and this is his third year. In parallel, he works as a private teacher since 2010 welcoming students at his house to teach them. With his youth loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, Hasan will pay his university fees. He only wishes to continue to learn easily to graduate and begin to work at a proper company to earn a good income that satisfies his life needs.

loans.use: pay his university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Nurane

texts.en: Nurane is a 19-year-old student at Culture and Art State University. Nurane successfully finished high school and entered the university.  She lives with her parents. Her father is a builder and her mother is a housewife. Nurane studied hard in high school and hopes that she can also successfully graduate from university and become a good specialist. She needs to pay her tuition, but her parents are not in a position to help her. She requests a loan of 2,000 AZN to pay for tuition. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Kou

texts.en: Kou is 40 years old and live in compound #3 with her husband and children. Her five children are in school and between the ages of 10 and 25. She says she stopped her education in the 6th grade. For 15 years now she has been selling fish in the local market. She has some problems she is facing that when the fish don’t sell out, she has to dry them for the next day to sell, and she don’t have enough income to sell quality fresh fish like cassava fish, butter nose, etc. She is requesting a loan to buy quality fresh fish for her business. Her plan is to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy quality fresh fish for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is 39 years old, a female and married. She has four children ages 15, 12,10, and 7 years old respectively, all of whom she supports. She was introduced to KADET Ltd by Kadet officer. She is a charcoal dealer, located at Mbuyu wa kusema in Malindi, and has been in this business for four years.

In her business, she earns a monthly income of ksh.10,000. This is her second loan of ksh.20,000, with which she intends to buy more charcoal . Her previous loan of ksh,20,000 she paid back successfully. Asha will use the anticipated profit to expand her business to be a charcoal depot. Her hopes and dreams for her future business and family are to grow her business, educate her children and live a good life.

loans.use: To buy more charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 27-year-old single Lebanese man. He has owned a café since 2009. There are good number of customers who visit him to rest at his café and enjoy his tasty coffee and other hot drinks. Today, he is asking to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to renovate his café and modernize it. Ali notes that these changes will unquestionably help him to attract more customers and hence earn superior income. In the future, he plans to expand his business and add a corner into his café where he will start to serve food plates and sandwiches.

loans.use: to renovate his café and modernize it.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn for her business.

loans.name: Zakariah

texts.en: Zakaria is a 22-year-old married man from Lebanon who lives with his wife. He has worked in the construction field for the past 3 years. His job consists of gypsum board work and he has one full-time employee who assists him to complete his tasks.  He creates artistic designs and decorations and he is very professional. Today, with his youth loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. he will buy construction tools and supplies such as a ladder. In the future, he plans to further expand his business by opening an office and working directly with multiple construction entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy construction tools and supplies

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is a 27-year-old widow from Lebanon. She has two children, both of them are still attending school. She owns a communication shop where people can make international phone calls. She has two full-time employees assisting her. With her youth loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, she will implement batteries series system at her shop.  With this, she will decrease the electricity bill amount, and therefore make more profit.  In the future, she plans to borrow additional Kiva loans with the aim of further expanding her business.

loans.use: implement batteries series system at her shop

loans.name: Imelda

texts.es:
La Señora Imelda, es docente de uno de los colegios de la ciudad de León, desde hace cinco años. Sale de su casa a las 6:30 am e inicia sus labores desde 06:50 pm hasta las 12:15 pm este  horario de lunes a viernes, es madre de 5 hijos. Realiza estas labores para el sustento de su familia.

El  crédito que  solicito la señora Imelda a Ceprodel será utilizado para comprar materiales de construcción tales como: Perlines  y zinc lo cual le permitirá realizar mejoras al techo de su vivienda brindándole un mejor confort tanto para ella como a su familia y mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Imelda has been a teacher at a school in the city of León for five years.  She leaves the house at 6.30am and works from 6.50am until 12.15pm, Monday to Friday.  Imelda is a mother to five children.  She works in order to support her family.

Imelda is applying to Ceprodel for a loan that she will use to buy building materials such as purlins and zinc.  These materials will allow her to make improvements to the roof of her home, providing both her and her family more comfort, and improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy purlins and zinc.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
La  señora María Elena,  es madre de  4 hijos de los cuales 1 está a su cargo, es vendedora de bisuterías ambulante en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de león, desde hace 15 años,  ofertando  sus productos  desde las 6:00 am y finaliza hasta las 1:00 pm. 

Este crédito fue utilizado para compra de  pastas dentales, aretes, tintes para el cabello, carteras, bolsos, entre otros artículos. 

La señora María con los créditos que Ceprodel le ha brindado ha logrado a comprar productos de  mayor calidad para ofertarles a sus clientes y público en general, y con esta ganancia ha logrado hacer mejora a su vivienda, ha incrementado su capital de trabajo y sueña  que su negocio siga creciendo cada día más.
texts.en:
María Elena is a mother to four children, one of whom still depends on her.  María works as a street vendor, selling jewellery in one of the markets in the city of León.  She has been doing this work for 15 years, selling her products from 6am until 1pm.

This loan will be used to buy toothpaste, purses, bags, earrings, hair dye, and other items.

Ceprodel loans have helped María to buy better quality products to offer her customers and the general public.  With profits, she has been able to improve her home and has increased her stock levels.  María dreams that her business will continue growing every day.

loans.use: to buy toothpaste, purses, bags, earrings, and hair dye.

loans.name: Carla Vanessa

texts.es:
La Señora Carla Vanessa, es conserje en una institución privada de la ciudad de León, desde hace doce años. Sale de su casa a las 5:30 am e inicia sus labores desde 06:00 am hasta las 05:00 pm este  horario de lunes a viernes, es madre soltera de 3 hijos. Realiza estas labores para el sustento de su familia.

Doña Carla Vanessa, el crédito  que solicito  a Ceprodel fue utilizado para gastos escolares de sus hijos permitiéndole mejor la educación y  poder completar el sueño de ver a sus hijos coronar una carrera profesional en el futuro.
texts.en:
Carla Vanessa has been a janitor at a private institution in the city of León for twelve years.  She leaves the house every morning at 5.30am and works from 6am until 5pm, Monday to Friday.  Carla is a single mother to three children.  She works in order to support her family.

Carla is applying for a loan from Ceprodel to cover her children's school costs.  This will give them a better education and will help Carla to achieve her dream of seeing her children becoming professionals in the future.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Fayza

texts.en: Fayza is a 61-year-old Lebanese married woman, living with her husband and only child. She has owned a mini market since 2011.  She sells dairy and daily products such as canned food, juices, bread, sweets etc.  She works very hard to support her family financially, especially considering that she is the one and only income source of the family.  With her requested loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, she will increase her store’s inventory of food provisions and drinks. She is confident that when diversifying goods, more customers will be attracted, and therefore higher income will be earned.

loans.use: increase her store’s inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertiliser and to pay for coffee cutters.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay coffee cutters.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en: Artur is from Gyumri town where he lives with his parents, grandmother, wife and two little children. As the only breadwinner of the family Artur works day and night earning income to cover his family's expenses. He has been running a small business for several years. He owns a small oven where he cooks pork and sells it to locals. Now, because of financial difficulties that the family currently faces, Artur lacks financial means to renovate his oven. He has requested this loan to purchase meat and renovate the oven. Artur has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is very important for Artur to be able to increase his capital and provide better service to his customers. Artur hopes for your support.

loans.use: to pay to renovate his oven and purchase meat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Adil

texts.en: Adil is a 47-year-old married man. He lives with his wife and two sons in a small village in the Bolnisi district. His sons go to a local school and his wife is a housekeeper. Adil is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, he has a plot of land where he grows potatoes and haricot. Adil decided to start a trading business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 3,000 USD to purchase a minibus. When the minibus is purchased, he will start trading fruits and vegetables to increase his family's income.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus and start a trading business

loans.name: Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo Group

texts.es: Doña Vilma es integrante de Banco Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo tiene 46 años de edad y es madre de 3 hijos, pero a su cargo solo está su hija menor y si nieto. Ella en una mujer muy valiente ya que siempre ha buscado la forma de sacar adelante a su familia pese a sus problemas de salud, ha sido operada 2 veces del corazón. Aún así Doña Vilma trabaja de sol a sol en su pequeña finca de donde cultiva plátano. Este es el cuarto préstamo que solicita, lo va a invertir en la compra de insumos como; semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insecticidas, bolsas, cajas y otros insumos.  Los deseos de esta señora son mejorar sus condiciones de vida, y tener la posibilidad de pagar servicios de salud privadas para mejorar su salud y seguir trabajando.  Junto a Doña Vilma están el grupo 6 socias más q van invertir en actividades agropecuarias.
texts.en:
Vilma is 46 years old and a member of the community bank Mujer Esfuerzo Mutuo. She is the mother of three children, but takes care of only one of them and a grandson. Vilma is described as a courageous person because she has always found a way to provide for her family, despite her health problems. She has had two heart operations but still works from sunrise to sunset on her small farm, where she grows plantains.

This is Vilma’s fourth loan, which she will use to buy supplies such as seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, bags and boxes. She says that her dream is to improve her living conditions and to be able to pay for private health care so that she can get better and continue working. Shown in the photo with Vilma are six other members of the group who are going to invest in agricultural businesses.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers, insecticides, bags, boxes and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weigh scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
